item.title: Harvard Maps GIS Services in 4 stories
item.description: Photo credit: Honora Spicer. Story #1 A student needed help finding geospatial data and we made them a step-by-step tutorial. Here is the tutorial to obtain crowd-sourced OpenStreetMap data developed for the student. Story #2 A student was still developing the concept for their mapping project and used their initial Harvard Maps consult to brainstorm and sketch out ideas. Map sketch by HKS student Justine Baillart. Story #3 Students make use of GIS resources beyond class projects.
